entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: Disable Microsoft.Extensions.Logging by default in Release builds #4394
  • Proposal: Remove Maui's Dependency on Extensions.Hosting #4393
  • iOS and MacCatalyst MauiApplicationDelegate should derive from UIResponder #4390
  • Button Background on WinUI only updates after you move the cursor off the Button #4386
  • First pass at consistent Mapper naming and shifting to interfaced handlers #4378
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • .NET MAUI Android target publishing/archiving #4377
  • [Blazor] Bring-in sdk style tests support for build and "publish" for Maui apps #4375
  • [Windows] Device.Display.MainDissplayInfo throws ArgumentException #4373
  • Collection view not working in realse mode #4371
  • Maui preview 4.0 when try to realease application show error #4369
  • Fix how our ViewHandler exposes out INativeViewHandler.NativeView and cleanup GetWrappedNativeView #4366
  • Error `Workload ID android-aot isn't supported on this platform.` on Windows #4363

Closed

  • Failed to publish maui blazor app on windows #3977
  • Crash on startup for default MAUI Blazor app on Android release mode #4262
  • [Bug] Maui-Blazor Project Template crashes in Release Mode #2246
  • Make Item Templates visible in Visual Studio #2686
  • `<MauiAsset>` is hard to use #3270
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Bug] BlazorWebView Issue if href to external site is clicked - can't return to app #3385
  • Essentials requires lifecycle registration steps to be fully usable beyond the template #4222
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Add nuget API diffs to CI pipeline #4316
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Incomplete callstack on startup exceptions in windows #4379
  • Blazor startup errors for duplicate routes is hard to discover and debug #3695
  • The MAUI app project template does not target windows out-of-the-box #4374
  • android's Switch is wrong working #4368
  • Toolbar menu items are no longer rendered in MAUI P12 #4337
  • Animation RelRotateTo Behaves different on windows and android #3560
  • Raw asset added to MauiApp replicates the source folder structure in the destination instead of adding it to the assets folder in Android #2145

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial design doc around how Handler Resolution works #4392
  • Switches to UIResponder for App/Scene delegates #4391
  • Correctly register DependencyService entries #4385
    area/hosting 🧩, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [Blazor] Add missing RootComponentCollectionExtensions to Wpf and Maui #4384
  • [X] add error diagnostics to XamlG sourceGen #4376
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Housekeeping] Add pending events in iOS DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #4372
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Set correct Idiom #4370
    area/Xaml </>, platform/windows 🪟

Merged

  • Support Blazor Android WebView `Back` Navigation #4364
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Update api-tools to support roll-forward #4387
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • ScrollView and Activityindicator interfaced Handlers #4382
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Use GetWrappedView to get the native view #4389
  • Publish the API diffs to the Extensions tab #4383
  • Improve consistency with resizetizer #4367
    t/breaking 💥, area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
  • Add `@dotnet/dotnet-maui-blazor-eng` to Blazor Desktop CODEOWNERS #4365
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4362
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Adding API diffs to the build #4354
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • WinUI TabbedPage Tests/Cleanup/BarBackground #4360
  • [android] update built-in AOT profile #4355

Updated

  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>, do-not-merge, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Shell page dependency injection now uses IServiceProvider.GetService() #4281
    area/shell 🐢
  • GraphicsView Touches - Alternate API #4342
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Add pending Picker events and notify items collection changes #4346
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Add pending events in EntryHandler #4347
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
